++ Wiki import

[:rel:back]
----
+++ General
Currently import only supports importing [MultipageTextFormat]. To call up the import dialog, select the option Wiki / Import.. from the "Wiki" menu.

+++ The dialog window
&bull; *Import format*
Here you choose the type of import you want. Currently only Multipage text is supported.

&bull; *Source file/directory*
Here you select the file to import.
